author: Will Canny
title: Bitcoin Mining Profitability Improved in May, JPMorgan Says
description: The total market cap of the 13 U.S.-listed miners that the bank tracks rose 19% from the month previous, according to the report.
content:
The total market cap of the 13 U.S.-listed miners that JPMorgan tracks rose almost 20% in May, as bitcoin 
 rallied and mining profitability increased, the bank said in a research report Monday.The … [+1016 chars]
